description: Anna (0-0) in her debut wrestling match shows much promise. Yes, she certainly lost to the Ninja (13-2) but she did not get creamed. As a mater of fact she held off the Ninja in Rd2 and scored one more point then the Ninja did for Rd2.--not an easy feat! Anna learned the ropes with this match, and if she continues to learn she will definitely be someone to contend with. Btw The Ninja brought her A-game to RD4: Hot!
title: Anna Mills vs. The Ninja
